datoCmsKey.name: Elizabeth M. Stewart

headshot.title: Elizabeth M. Stewart, headshot via Editor, 6:06:45 PM 3/16/2021

datoCmsKey.locations: Baltimore| New York City| Washington DC| New Haven
datoCmsKey.bio:
Elizabeth M. Stewart is a New York City based lighting designer whose work has been seen in New York, London, Philadelphia, and more, in venues ranging from art gallery basements to off-Broadway theatres. 

Elizabeth is an Associate Consultant for Charcoalblue LLC, and an alumna of New York University - Tisch School of the Arts. Elizabeth was a 2018 Hangar Design Fellow.
